Module 7 Module 4: Statistical Analysis

Module 7 Module 4: Statistical Analysis This chapter covers: Summary statistics (mean, median, variance) Correlation and t-tests ANOVA and regression analysis t.test(mpg ~ am, data = mtcars) ## ## Welch Two Sample t-test ## ## data: mpg by am ## t = -3.7671, df = 18.332, p-value = 0.001374 ## alternative hypothesis: true difference in means between group 0 and group 1 is not equal to 0 ## 95 percent confidence interval: ## -11.280194 -3.209684 ## sample estimates: ## mean in group 0 mean in group 1 ## 17.14737 24.39231
